name: MIF WP Customizer
author: Alexey Sergeev

sections.description:
Plugin of additional WordPress customization for creation of social network site.

Allows to implement:

1) placing of user login and logout tools in menu areas and widgets’ areas of
stand-alone sites of social network;

2) functioning of subscription tools for updates of stand-alone sites by
members of social network;

3) improving of management and site navigation tools (toolbar management,
page scrolling, page redirection).

It is oriented on work in WordPress Multisite mode with social networking plugin
BuddyPress. It can be used in regular WordPress installations for solving individual
tasks.
sections.installation:
1. Install as any other plugin.
  2. Activate for network or for a separate site.
  3. Visit (in console) “Settings” -> “WP Customizer” page, select needed options.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • “Become a member of the site” – remembers the role if you leave the site, and then again become a member
  • fix join to multisite (automatic)
  • settings page fix

1.0.0

  • first public plugin version
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install as any other plugin.
  2. Activate for network or for a separate site.
  3. Visit (in console) “Settings” -> “WP Customizer” page, select needed options.
